coverage_details.accommodation: Single Room; Standard suite covered up to 4,000 SAR. Companion cost is covered for all members and parents.
coverage_details.std: Treatment of STD is covered regardless of how the infection occurred, including: Nongonococcal urethritis, Trichomoniasis, HIV, Syphilis, Human Papillomavirus (genital warts), Neisseria gonorrhoeae, Genital herpes, Chancroid.
coverage_details.premature_babies_treatment: Covered up to annual limit. Care for premature babies is covered up to annual limit.
coverage_details.checkup: Adult vaccinations, checkup and family doctors, according to National Health Services (Weqaya) guidelines is covered.
coverage_details.vaccination: Vaccinations per MOH schedule, covered up to 9,999,999.99 SR, for children up to 6 years and as per any MOH updates. RSV vaccine as per MOH is covered.
coverage_details.optical_frame: Frames and contact lenses are covered up to 2,000 SAR (up to twice for children up to 14 years), with 20% up to 100 SAR deductible.
coverage_details.birth_control: Family planning (birth control for females) covered up to 1,500 SAR. Contraceptive methods for pregnancy covered up to 1,500 SAR (not covered for Parent scheme).
coverage_details.obesity_surgery_bmi_over_35: Surgical procedures other than Gastric Sleeve covered if BMI is 40 kg/m2 or 35 kg/m2 with complications, in line with medical guidelines. List includes LAGB, Laparoscopic Sleeve Gastrostomy, Roux-En-Y Bypass, Mini/One anastomosis Bypass, BPD Scopinaro, Gastric Band removal, conversions, and revision surgeries. Overall obesity treatment coverage 20,000 SAR.
coverage_details.obesity_surgery_bmi_over_40: Surgical procedures as above. Overall obesity treatment coverage 20,000 SAR.
coverage_details.organ_transplant: Surgery for donor organ harvesting covered up to 50,000 SAR.
coverage_details.neonatal_screening: National program for early detection for newborns covered up to 100,000 SAR. Early detection of deafness/congenital heart malformations for all newborns covered.
coverage_details.psychiatric: Psychiatric cases (including non-acute) covered up to 50,000 SAR, up to 4 visits.
coverage_details.hearing_aids_audiometry: Hearing aid covered up to 6,000 SAR. Early detection program for deafness at birth is covered.
coverage_details.dental_general: SR 5,000.00 limit with 20% up to 100 SAR deductible. Scaling once per year. Crowns and bridges, Pins and Post related to dental crowns are covered.
coverage_details.neo_natal_care: Premature babies care covered up to annual limit; coverage of newborns under motherâ€™s policy up to 30 days.
coverage_details.circumcision: Circumcision for males up to 500 SAR.
coverage_details.newborn_disability_screening: Cost of neonatal metabolic screening for newborns and disability covered up to 100,000 SAR.
coverage_details.congenital: Acute congenital illnesses covered up to annual limit; non-acute congenital illnesses covered up to 50,000 SAR.
coverage_details.maternity: Antenatal care and normal vaginal delivery covered up to 15,000 SAR. Complications, C-section, legal abortion up to annual limit. Not covered for Parents scheme.
coverage_details.optical: SR 2,000.00 per annual limit; all lens types covered up to optical limit.
coverage_details.ear_piercing: Ear piercing for females covered up to 300 SAR.
coverage_details.screening: Screening for all newborns and congenital heart anomalies covered.
coverage_details.disability_cases: Disability cases including neonatal screening covered up to 100,000 SAR.
coverage_details.special_instructions: Companion covered for all members and parents. Pre-existing and chronic conditions covered with medication. Rehabilitation and artificial limbs up to 100,000 SAR. Joint replacement surgeries up to 50,000 SAR. Adult vaccinations, ICU treatments, local ambulance, allergy tests and treatments are covered. Treatment for psoriasis, infectious diseases requiring hospital isolation is covered. Home healthcare and telemedicine are covered. International S.O.S for emergency evacuation to Saudi hospitals is included. Medical devices for diabetes, blood pressure, and steam treatment are covered. Nutritional supplements, vitamins, and minerals covered if essential for a medical condition and prescribed by an authorized physician. Medication limit equal to pre-authorization approval limit. All benefits within CHI are provided unless otherwise stated. Transportation of mortal remains is covered up to 10,000 SAR.
